summary: After dropping out of private school, Hiroshi enrolls at a public school and falls in with a pack of unruly thugs. He loves the reckless partying, smoking and boozing - but can he hang when... See full summary »
cast: Hiroki Narimiya|Hiro Mizushima|Yuika Motokariya|Yusuke Kamiji|Noriko Nakagoshi|Show Aikawa|Yûji Ayabe|Ken'ichi Endô|Satoshi Fujimoto|Toshifumi Fujimoto|Razor Ramon H.G.|Todd Haberkorn|Mitsumi Hiromura|Jun'ichi Kômoto|Jamie Marchi|Shûichirô Masuda|Tôru Masuoka|Daisuke Miyagawa|Tomoko Murakami|Yasuko Nakamura|Kazuki Namioka|Natsuki Okamoto|Maki Sakai|Masahito Sakamoto|Hiroshi Shinagawa|Tomoharu Shôji|Suguru|Toru Wakatsuki
title: Doroppu
